title: Which type of song should I listen to when my crush doesn't talk to me? - Quora

response.answer_text: Songs about love. Uplifting songs. It was Always You, Lucky Strike, Feelings by Maroon 5; Feel the Love by Rudimental; Death of Bachelor Album by Panic! At the Disco; whatever’s your fancy. After all it’s what you feel in the mood for, I don’t know what kind of music you like. But when I was feeling a little crushy on someone I listened to Shut Up and Dance with Me for weeks, until I got sick of the song. XD Edit: Oh I just reread your question. Hmmm do you mean when they’re ignoring you or something? At first I was like it’s obvious love songs, but if they’re ignoring you then hey sad songs by Shawn Mendes

‘Fuck you’ - CeeLo Green ‘Smile’ Lily Allen ‘Fill me in’ - Craig David ‘So What’ - Pink ‘Gives You Hell’ - All American Rejects ‘Heartbroken’ - T2 ‘Don’t’ - Bryson Tiller ‘It’s Over Now’ - Big Ang ‘If I Were A Boy’ Beyoncé ‘Do You Know’ - Enrique ‘Drunk’ - Ed Sheeran
